text: Shag Rocks are barren rocks situated 8 nautical milesNOAA Chart 13270, scale 1:25,000, Boston Harbor offshore of Custom House Tower in downtown Boston, in the Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area and within the city limits of Boston. The rocks are northeast of Little Brewster Island and east of Great Brewster Island and have been the site of several shipwrecks. Boston Light on Little Brewster Island warns mariners to steer clear of the rocks. Public access is impractical. ==References== Category:Boston Harbor islands Category:Islands of Massachusetts Category:Islands of Suffolk County, Massachusetts
title: Shag Rocks (Massachusetts)
